channel.title: Special Effects
channel.description:
Project for the History of VFX class. One of the first effects ever done and still used for almost all effects.
I was just trying to make the amp look small, but I just realized he looks huge compared to the house as well.
The driveway actually wasn't that flat as you can see. Didn't notice until now but it doesn't detract too much.
C&C?
[URL=http://img296.imageshack.us/my.php?image=dsc05736lb1.jpg][IMG]http://img296.imageshack.us/img296/5688/dsc05736lb1.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img296.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]

item.title: Special Effects
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

If the car wasn’t in it, it would have looked like you wanted it. But the car gives you too much perspective.

Read full topic

item.title: Special Effects
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yes it’s very easy.
The only thing is finding a way to nicely cut out the feet and whatever it’s standing on.
In this case I thought I did, but the viewfinder has a crop rate so they really weren’t out of the picture and cropping them out didn’t look nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Special Effects
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Yeah… It is sitting in front of the garage while he is closer to the camera, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Special Effects
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Looks like its sitting in front of the garage, to be honest i thought that this was a blank image you were gunna add a lightning bolt to your fingertip or something.

Read full topic
